title: NBA Regular-Season Observations, Plus Chris Ryan on the Sixers, Embiid, and the Super League
description:
Russillo opens with his NBA regular-season observations, including the evolution of the MVP race and more, before a “Worst Dude Ever” title contender edition (1:30). Next, he talks with The Ringer’s Chris Ryan about his confidence in the 76ers come playoff time, where Joel Embiid ranks in his list of favorite Sixers, and how he sees the rest of the playoffs playing out (16:30). Then, Russillo, Chris, and producer Steve Ceruti talk about the the idea of the Super League and how it could impact American sports (37:30). Finally, Ryen closes the show with some listener-submitted Life Advice questions (1:02:00).

Host: Ryen Russillo
Guest: Chris Ryan
Producer: Kyle Crichton
Producer: Steve Ceruti
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
